website_summaries.verdict: One of the best speed chutes for professional-level or serious resistance training.
pros: Unique chute design captures more air without creating too much wind resistance
Chute is easy to use in several different exercises and training regimes
cons: Strap lacks the ability to adjust to different body shapes and sizes

customer_reviews.title: Fabric ripped within three practice uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for the soccer team I coach. (13 yos) After using at practices, (after the third practice) one of the chutes ripped and is no good. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brewnette

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my 11 year old son. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 11 year old son. It is a little hard for him to work, I think due to his size and maybe age. But the videos on the selling page are helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: My son didn't realize how much this can challenge him while running. It's good! Now I have him using this while pulling the weight sled up hill so he can see how things were for me when I was young and walking to school uphill both direction for 5 miles carrying my books under my arm. Just kidding! Good tool.
customer_reviews.author: dpb

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive
customer_reviews.text: Worked great 1st2 times my 13 yr old used it. 3rd time, the Velcro kept coming off as he ran to 1st base. The ad on @Amazon shows it a video with instructions with a harness like on the bungee chord trainers. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rodger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I adore Amazon Prime but I have yet to order a product that wasn’t spot on exactly what we were looking for. I wanted some extra equipment to help my son shave time on his sprints and this was exactly what I was needing he’s already using it on the days he’s not with his Coach he’s doing extra work with this parachute and it’s awesome highly recommend! It has a Velcro waistband to fit range of sizes from big kid to adult and the chute doesn’t require too much tail wind to inflate so overall an excellent chute.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fox

customer_reviews.title: It's Sure To Bring Improvement!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! It makes sprints even more challenging and that's what I was looking for! Just be sure to give it your all, and you'll see that it works amazingly! I would highly recommend this to anyone who feels like their regular sprinting isn't helping them get faster!
customer_reviews.author: William Owens

customer_reviews.title: Cheap made, causes little resistance.
customer_reviews.text: Super thin and generic. I bought this last year for my 16 yr old son and he tried using it twice, but it causes very very little resistance he said. My son said when he ran with it he couldnt even tell it was there. Very cheaply made. Might be good for a young child.
customer_reviews.author: leigh kov

customer_reviews.title: Nice trainer to increase speed
customer_reviews.text: I got this trainer for my husband, he is training for a triathlon, and very interested in increasing his speed. This works pretty well, he likes the additional difficulty. We also tied it to one of our kayaks and let the wind Drag us around the lake, which was kind of fun.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to train for soccer. Basically does nothing to help slow her down and build endurance. Even at top speed it was a mess. It‘ll end up sitting in her soccer bag because it‘ll never be used again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks sturdy and opens up quick
customer_reviews.text: Offers fair resistance, looks sturdy and opens up quick. I had fun using it.
customer_reviews.author: Taajer

customer_reviews.title: Works hard to make you work hard
customer_reviews.text: This thing is killer. Fills up super quick and forces you to work! My kids thought it was really challenging and I can't be happier for the price and durability
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Clients love this!
customer_reviews.text: If you're a personal trainer looking to give more variety to your clients, you have to get this! My clients love it!
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and poor quality. Came apart writhing first 5 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.author: Dadass

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my Grandson. He loves it. Trains with it daily. Really good value. Cheaper than Dick's. Coach was impressed with the quality of the product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LEDDIE

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a thicker trash bag, you're better off just using a couple of those at home. I got this to try out and it does hold you back a bit but I would recommend spending a couple extra bucks on a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little smaller than the picture. Very light and small. Daughter had trouble getting the chute to open up at all by running. Will work well on a bicycle or skating.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Presnell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: What my daughter was looking for works well and serves the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for a great price. You don't need to break your bank to get a little resistance while training so I would recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell92

customer_reviews.title: Gift for the Grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves attaching this parachute and running thru the yard and it gives him a good work out.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the toolbox!
customer_reviews.text: Adds just the right level of resistance. Not too much, not too little!
customer_reviews.author: James N. Smith

customer_reviews.title: easy to deploy and keep in the air as long ...
customer_reviews.text: Nephew is training for his first year in football and he is getting faster by the week... easy to deploy and keep in the air as long as he keeps running
customer_reviews.author: Ash B

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Don’t think it could last more than a month
customer_reviews.author: Jayson Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product. We had another one but misplaced it. So we order this one. It works great for our daughters training. She is a track runner
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: About what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a bit bigger but it does add some resistance while sprinting. I would say a 15-25% added resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Emil

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good product wished the Velcro was longer to fit around a smaller sized person.
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and dependable
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job, easy to put away and set up
customer_reviews.author: David Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Worked well the first few times but fabric rips very easily. Wouldn't buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on March 8, 2019. I used it roughly 6-8 times on a school track and I just noticed last week it ripped. I took very good care of it and don't understand why it made a hole. Wouldn't recommend if you're looking for something durable.
customer_reviews.author: jorge c

customer_reviews.title: Awesome starting parachute
customer_reviews.text: It is a great starter parachute, however make sure to read the deminsions of the Velcro. My nephew is still too skinny for it as a high school freshman (nothing some protein can’t take care of)
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Leal

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: This worked great but it took awhile for him to figure out that he had to run pretty quick to feel the effects. lol But we do believe it is helping since he notices the difference when he takes it off.
customer_reviews.author: Denise in a warm climate

customer_reviews.title: A perfectly priced resistance training device
customer_reviews.text: A great supplement to our son’s and daughter’s workouts! Perfect for offering resistance and intensifying a runner’s training.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Knorr

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made.
customer_reviews.text: Using it for speed drills with my kids. They love it. I have only used it once so I can’t speak to durability.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Leone

customer_reviews.title: Super speed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this a couple times and it has improved my speed well and gives good resistance
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Pay for something more expensive
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made for the cheap cost.. Does not perform well..
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: so far so good! bought for my son as a gift and have NOT heard any complaints!
customer_reviews.author: jf

customer_reviews.title: use and does
customer_reviews.text: I'm all about working out for as little time as possible while getting maximum benefit. This is easy to use and does exactly what it's intended to do. I did take a few tries the first few times I tried using . Very inexpensive way to add some speed.
customer_reviews.author: T R Richardso

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Material
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 13 year old brother (5ft 2in/75lbs) for Christmas. After opening, he decided to use it. It only worked for a short sprint. I’m talking less than 5 seconds. The product is made from VERY cheap material, and I would not recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material but it will do the job. Won’t break.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about a month. Used it 4-5 times. Works great. Enough resistance for burst sprints. Slightly cheap. Material isn’t the best but it’s hasn’t broken on me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisficed
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my Son. He is very satisficed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid!
customer_reviews.text: Parachute provides great resistance to your sprints and is very easy to use and carry along with the enclosed carry on bag. Overall a great product that gives more than its fair share of bang for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Valtierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical because of the price. Very well made and a great addition to our training equipment
customer_reviews.author: SSumma

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of resistance
customer_reviews.text: Good for youths and children. Not so good for adults especially if you're looking for more resistance. Doesn't really pull you back so you can't really feel it. Seems like i'm running without it. Could just be me. Overall, it does the job for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Surachai Xiong

customer_reviews.title: Hi this is helpful
customer_reviews.text: Great l read the review can’t wait to use it ok
customer_reviews.author: Sylvester muldrow jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome buy but the Velcro sometimes comes off or undone when the players are running
customer_reviews.author: Malerie Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my daughter to increase her speed for soccer. The chute did absolutely nothing didn't even feel any resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Hoover

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my dog! Saved me $30 from the Dog parachute.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Cummins

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's durable but really hard to get it in the air and stay.
customer_reviews.author: alv

customer_reviews.title: His students really enjoyed the parachute and said it works great in strength ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my son's football camp. His students really enjoyed the parachute and said it works great in strength building.
customer_reviews.author: Sherell C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Parachute
customer_reviews.text: Son is using it to increase speed and so far so good
customer_reviews.author: mrsstar3

customer_reviews.title: It was amazing. It really make me work hard
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my morning workout! It was amazing. It really make me work hard. Will be recommending to friends!
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 2 kids that play soccer. As we recently purchased this, we’ve used it for a couple of days and it seems pretty good work out for the kids. What I also like about is that it came with a bag to store it and you can take it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Noni Z

customer_reviews.title: Just buy a weight vest
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really catch wind even at a sprint. Kinda lame.
customer_reviews.author: Koompa

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with speed. I want a bigger one too.
customer_reviews.author: Lole

customer_reviews.title: Great training aid, medium quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these and they are definitely worth the money. I’ve had one tear but that was because of user error. I highly recommend using at least two at a time if your indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Quintin J Horton

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Made pretty cheaply 50% of the chute is coming apart already after two uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my son, but he wasn't tall enough to make it work properly
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this to increase his speed for sports. It does exactly as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for me but I'm slow my nephews use it fine they're 13 and 16 yrs
customer_reviews.text: This didn't work for me but I'm slow my nephews use it fine they're 13 and 16 yrs old
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality, questionable utility.
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the chute and strap seem fine, but overall it doesn't really do much. My 6 year old tried it and didn't notice any effect. This is more gimmicky than something that will really improve your training.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Does what isis supposed to but cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Great for resistance training
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Kids 9 and 13 and adult all able to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Boyz

customer_reviews.title: Must be running fast for these to open and work properly.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them 1 time since receiving last week. 1st day out 1 chute broke. It wasn't opening like the others when the player was running with it and then we noticed that the there was a hole where the strap attached to the chute. So we threw it away. So we have 3 left that we'll see if those last.
customer_reviews.author: 2Angels

customer_reviews.title: Instant hit for the little athletes
customer_reviews.text: My niece and nephew loved this Put it on immediately
customer_reviews.author: Lizm

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: My kids used it twice and it tore. It wasn't dragging or anything. It just came apart at the seam. Disappointed because it is a great aid to use as my kids train for junior Olympics.
customer_reviews.author: Ccduble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: uses for my youth football team are great..waist strap a liitle long but adjust fine
customer_reviews.author: BMAN ENTERPRISES

customer_reviews.title: Kids review
customer_reviews.text: Kid wanted this to help train for football.... he is only 11. He gave it a 4/5.
customer_reviews.author: Royal Shin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly that. ITS OK. the chute is flimsy ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly that. ITS OK. the chute is flimsy on the tie ends. Very thin stitching. Doesn't have a adjustment on the strap.
customer_reviews.author: david harmon

customer_reviews.title: My athletes love training with “the chutes”
customer_reviews.text: My grandson plays football and my granddaughter plays soccer. They both train together with the chutes and they say the resistance is just right for their needs. I bought 6 more for his middle school football team.
customer_reviews.author: Juanda LaJoyce Holley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son he loves it definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use both my 6 year old and 17 year old use it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: minimal resistance
customer_reviews.text: The concept to help develop speed is good on this product. One chute provides minimal resistance. It would take at least three chutes to create the resistance needed to improve your speed.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Mathew

customer_reviews.title: fun product
customer_reviews.text: my kids love this. in the wins it is super fun to play with!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna O.

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: First time my 12 year old son used it, it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Heide Spence

customer_reviews.title: It has been a great training
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for me son. It has been a great training aid
customer_reviews.author: C. York

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't inflate all the way. You have to get a significant running start before it fully inflates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now, if your looking at it
customer_reviews.text: excellent for putting a little bit of resistance when running but use a bigger parachute if you have prior training
customer_reviews.author: Alec Villaspin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get them
customer_reviews.text: It was broken when I received it. Not good quality
customer_reviews.author: Sarahi

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Does not open up. Please don't buy. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Dorcena

customer_reviews.title: Bad buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for the 10u flag football team I coach and the material ripped at the first practice on both. I am not happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: ernest webb

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Breaks Immediately
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely unhappy with this item. It was username once and broke immediately. It couldn’t even be used more than once. I will not be purchasing this item or anything else from this seller anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: They're perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My boys use these for training, in multiple sports. They're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: It’s not worth it
customer_reviews.text: There’s no difference between running what th and without it
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Will fit smaller children
customer_reviews.text: Product came as expected with it being winter and just having had a snow storm my son hasn't been able to use it yet. He isn't the fastest kid on the football team and it really bothers him. I'm hoping he can use this this coming spring and summer to help him with this. He has however tried it on and it does fit him around the waist. He's only 9 and weighs around 65 lbs so he's a pretty thin kid and I wasn't sure if it would fit but it does! He's excited to try it. It came in a nice little bag that closes for storage which was nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Eden C

customer_reviews.title: Won’t disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it expands pretty quick and out feel the resistance right away. Very comfortable, doesn’t dig I to you. I highly recommend this parachute.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Ruiz-Elizondo

customer_reviews.title: Good for running training
customer_reviews.text: Whery good product and I have been very impressed with it. Helps with the speed running training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It definitely adds resistance to your running, and its durable and light weight
customer_reviews.author: shaphan hayes

customer_reviews.title: They make running harder so they work.
customer_reviews.text: Parachute is functional and provides drag for runners while running. The straps fit a variety of sizes but seem larger for middle school kids. Some of them can not attach the Velcro because it is to large for them. The parachute seems to hold up well, but the straps that attach to the parachute have come apart and needed to be stitched back together. Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it it helped increase my speed over the results my coach had told me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoot, I’ve used it multiple times and no ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoot , I’ve used it multiple times and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Amis

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the materials.
customer_reviews.text: Chute ripped after 7 minutes of usage on a grass field.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large, works great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 4 year old as he loves parachutes. He wears it and runs around the house on a daily basis. The only issue was the sticker and tape that was on the outside of the storage pouch. It left a sticky residue that would not come off.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't catch wind easily even when sprinting at top speed
customer_reviews.text: It works but it's just a bit too flimsy. Doesn't catch wind easily even when sprinting at top speed, and the belt doesn't quite snug to your waist properly. I got a couple of good reps but not a long lasting product, easily tears. Overall: it's just 'eh'.
customer_reviews.author: Browne

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband. It arrived on time. He used it the day it arrived and liked it. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material but not very useful
customer_reviews.text: While the parachute material itself is good, quality material, the parachute doesn't inflate enough to provide any measureable resistance until I'm running at a full sprint. Unfortunately, I'm not in good enough shape to run at a full sprint long enough for this to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: c fire

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoot is too small for my 10 year old. Not enough resistance.
customer_reviews.author: football mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little parachute for running but no so great for jumping off the roof.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Uri

customer_reviews.title: If you are a serious athlete with any kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are a serious athlete with any kind of speed please do yourself a favor and avoid this chute. No kind of real resistance whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Urban

customer_reviews.title: Not real good running on hills
customer_reviews.text: Not really effective as expected . Not real good running on hills. It's at it's best running 50+ yards
customer_reviews.author: McRan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stitching in one corner fell out on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miller

customer_reviews.title: god is on the MOVE
customer_reviews.text: So far so GOOD used it ONCE. Very nice parachutes. Great Price. I'll buy more. With the wind,, real resistance.. Good training tools.. Amen

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Wind resistance tore the material first time out. Extremely poorly made.

product_meta.title: StillCool Running Speed Training, 56 inch Speed Drills Resistance Parachute Running Sprint Chute Soccer Football Sport Speed Training Black…
feature_bullets: 56" diameter, it can provide 25-35 lbs of resistance
Experiments show that the speed increases, the resistance provided by the resistance parachute increasing.

Withe drag chute, you can do strength training and speed training at the same time. Through this exercise, can improve the ability of the user's acceleration, muscle endurance, and enhance the ability to adjust the direction of the high-speed running.
You can tie two or more resistance parachute to improve sport effect.
Fully functional unit includes parachute and belt with velcro closure,Easily folds down to fit in the carrying bag included.
